languages.text: "Ну, сели, начали партию. Я рядом кручусь, вроде и не при делах, но поглядываю. И голова у меня все сильнее и сильнее трещит... короче, хорошо, что я сообразила вовремя, что дело не в слитой партии, а в чем-то другом — вытащила Лорд-капитана из-за стола под предлогом каким, уволокла подальше, а через считанные минуты там, где мы были..." {n}Идира не выдерживает и начинает хохотать.{/n} "Оказывается, какой-то умник тоже приволок с собой ручного {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g}! Из тех, что в подполье Футфола шарятся! Он взял и... перенервничал, короче! Говорят, когда в эту комнату после всей катавасии заглянули, все, кто там был, друг друга перегрызли! В прямом смысле! Зубами!" {n}Идира, всхлипывая, вытирает выступившую слезу.{/n} "Ох... кажется, тот астероид потом вообще от Футфола отцепили и в открытый космос оттолкнули, чтобы в местную звезду улетел".

traits.locale_text: "Ну, сели, начали партию. Я рядом кручусь, вроде и не при делах, но поглядываю. И голова у меня все сильнее и сильнее трещит... короче, хорошо, что я сообразила вовремя, что дело не в слитой партии, а в чем-то другом — вытащила Лорд-капитана из-за стола под предлогом каким, уволокла подальше, а через считанные минуты там, где мы были..." {n}Идира не выдерживает и начинает хохотать.{/n} "Оказывается, какой-то умник тоже приволок с собой ручного {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g}! Из тех, что в подполье Футфола шарятся! Он взял и... перенервничал, короче! Говорят, когда в эту комнату после всей котовасии заглянули, все, кто там был, друг друга перегрызли! В прямом смысле! Зубами!" {n}Идира, всхлипывая, вытирает выступившую слезу.{/n} "Ох... кажется, тот астероид потом вообще от Футфола отцепили и в открытый космос оттолкнули, чтобы в местную звезду улетел".
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "So, they sat down, and the cards were dealt. I'm hovering around, like I'm not involved, but I'm keeping my eye on things. And everything in my head keeps getting louder and louder... anyway, it's a good thing I realised in time that my mind wasn't going haywire over a losing hand, but something else. I made some excuse to drag the Lord Captain up from the table and took her away from that place, and a few minutes later, the room where we'd been..." {n}Idira can't help herself and bursts out laughing.{/n} "It turned out some wise guy had the same bright idea to bring a pet {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} along with him! One of those ones who just scuttle around in Footfall's underbelly. And the psyker just... freaked out, I guess! After all the commotion, people went to see what happened in the room — and they'd all gone for each others' throats! Literally! With teeth!" {n}Weeping, Idira wipes away a tear.{/n} "Huh... and I think they completely detached that asteroid from Footfall and pushed it off into open space so it would head off toward the local star."
languages.original_text: "Ну, сели, начали партию. Я рядом кручусь, вроде и не при делах, но поглядываю. И голова у меня все сильнее и сильнее трещит... короче, хорошо, что я сообразила вовремя, что дело не в слитой партии, а в чем-то другом — вытащила Лорд-капитана из-за стола под предлогом каким, уволокла подальше, а через считанные минуты там, где мы были..." {n}Идира не выдерживает и начинает хохотать.{/n} "Оказывается, какой-то умник тоже приволок с собой ручного {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}псайкера{/g}! Из тех, что в подполье Футфола шарятся! Он взял и... перенервничал, короче! Говорят, когда в эту комнату после всей катавасии заглянули, все, кто там был, друг друга перегрызли! В прямом смысле! Зубами!" {n}Идира, всхлипывая, вытирает выступившую слезу.{/n} "Ох... кажется, тот астероид потом вообще от Футфола отцепили и в открытый космос оттолкнули, чтобы в местную звезду улетел".

traits.locale_text: "So, they sat down, and the cards were dealt. I'm hovering around, like I'm not involved, but I'm keeping my eye on things. And everything in my head keeps getting louder and louder... anyway, it's a good thing I realized in time that my mind wasn't going haywire over a losing hand, but something else. I made some excuse to drag the Lord Captain up from the table and took her away from that place, and a few minutes later, the room where we'd been..." {n}Idira can't help herself and bursts out laughing.{/n} "It turned out some wise guy had the same bright idea to bring a pet {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} along with him! One of those ones who just scuttle around in Footfall's underbelly. And the psyker just... freaked out, I guess! After all the commotion, people went to see what happened in the room — and they'd all gone for each others' throats! Literally! With teeth!" {n}Weeping, Idira wipes away a tear.{/n} "Huh... and I think they completely detached that asteroid from Footfall and pushed it off into open space so it would head off toward the local star."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

I made some excuse to drag the Lord Captain up from the table and took her away from that place, and a few minutes later, the room where we'd been..." {n}Idira can't help herself and bursts out laughing.{/n} "It turned out some wise guy had the same bright idea to bring a pet {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} along with him! After all the commotion, people went to see what happened in the room — and they'd all gone for each others' throats! Literally! With teeth!" {n}Weeping, Idira wipes away a tear.{/n} "Huh... and I think they completely detached that asteroid from Footfall and pushed it off into open space so it would head off toward the local star."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “于是他们就坐下来了，开始发牌。我当时在旁边晃荡，并没有参与那场游戏，但我一直在关注周围的事情，脑子里的声音也变得越来越响……总之，好在我及时意识到，我脑子里乱了套并不是因为我输了一手牌，而是因为别的什么原因。于是我便找了个借口，把领主舰长从桌子旁边拖走了，带她离开了那个地方。几分钟之后，就在那个房间里……”{n}伊迪拉控制不住自己，突然大笑起来。{/n}“里面也有个聪明的家伙，也想到了同样聪明的打算。他也带着他的{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}灵能者{/g}宠物一起去赌钱了！其中有个灵能者是生活在落脚港底层的那种，那个人……当场就吓坏了，我猜！他引起了骚动，之后所有人都去了那个房间，想看看到底发生了什么事情。随后，人们开始撕扯起了对方的喉咙！我是说真的！连牙都用上了！”{n}伊迪拉擦了擦笑出来的眼泪。{/n}“嗯……后来，那颗小行星从落脚港彻底分离了出来。落脚港的人把它推到了空旷的宇宙中，让它朝着那个星系的恒星飞过去。”
languages.original_text: "So, they sat down, and the cards were dealt. I'm hovering around, like I'm not involved, but I'm keeping my eye on things. And everything in my head keeps getting louder and louder... anyway, it's a good thing I realised in time that my mind wasn't going haywire over a losing hand, but something else. I made some excuse to drag the Lord Captain up from the table and took her away from that place, and a few minutes later, the room where we'd been..." {n}Idira can't help herself and bursts out laughing.{/n} "It turned out some wise guy had the same bright idea to bring a pet {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} along with him! One of those ones who just scuttle around in Footfall's underbelly. And the psyker just... freaked out, I guess! After all the commotion, people went to see what happened in the room — and they'd all gone for each others' throats! Literally! With teeth!" {n}Weeping, Idira wipes away a tear.{/n} "Huh... and I think they completely detached that asteroid from Footfall and pushed it off into open space so it would head off toward the local star."

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "So, they sat down, and the cards were dealt. I'm hovering around, like I'm not involved, but I'm keeping my eye on things. And everything in my head keeps getting louder and louder... anyway, it's a good thing I realised in time that my mind wasn't going haywire over a losing hand, but something else. I made some excuse to drag the Lord Captain up from the table and took her away from that place, and a few minutes later, the room where we'd been..." {n}Idira can't help herself and bursts out laughing.{/n} "It turned out some wise guy had the same bright idea to bring a pet psyker along with him! One of those ones who just scuttle around in Footfall's underbelly. And the psyker just... freaked out, I guess! After all the commotion, people went to see what happened in the room — and they'd all gone for each others' throats! Literally! With teeth!" {n}Weeping, Idira wipes away a tear.{/n} "Huh... and I think they completely detached that asteroid from Footfall and pushed it off into open space so it would head off toward the local star."

languages.text: «Así que se sentaron y repartieron las cartas. Yo estoy por ahí, como si la cosa no fuera conmigo, pero estoy vigilándolo todo. Y las voces de mi cabeza se vuelven cada vez más fuertes... En fin, me alegro de haberme dado cuenta a tiempo de que mi mente no se estaba volviendo loca por una mala mano, sino por otro motivo. Me inventé una excusa para levantar a la Lord Capitán de la mesa y alejarla de aquel lugar y, unos minutos después, la sala en la que habíamos estado...». {n}Idira no consigue reprimir las carcajadas.{/n} «¡Resultó que un listillo tuvo la misma brillante idea de traerse a su {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} mascota! Uno de los que se esconden en los barrios bajos de Paso. Y el psíquico... ¡se debió de asustar, supongo! Después de todo el escándalo, la gente entró a la sala... ¡y se habían abalanzado unos sobre otros! ¡A la garganta! ¡Con sus dientes!». {n}Sin dejar de reír, Idira se seca una lágrima.{/n} «Ay... creo que desacoplaron ese asteroide al completo de Paso y lo lanzaron al espacio para que se fundiera contra la estrella local».
languages.original_text: "So, they sat down, and the cards were dealt. I'm hovering around, like I'm not involved, but I'm keeping my eye on things. And everything in my head keeps getting louder and louder... anyway, it's a good thing I realised in time that my mind wasn't going haywire over a losing hand, but something else. I made some excuse to drag the Lord Captain up from the table and took her away from that place, and a few minutes later, the room where we'd been..." {n}Idira can't help herself and bursts out laughing.{/n} "It turned out some wise guy had the same bright idea to bring a pet {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} along with him! One of those ones who just scuttle around in Footfall's underbelly. And the psyker just... freaked out, I guess! After all the commotion, people went to see what happened in the room — and they'd all gone for each others' throats! Literally! With teeth!" {n}Weeping, Idira wipes away a tear.{/n} "Huh... and I think they completely detached that asteroid from Footfall and pushed it off into open space so it would head off toward the local star."

traits.locale_text: «Así que se sentaron y repartieron las cartas. Yo estoy por ahí, como si la cosa no fuera conmigo, pero estoy vigilándolo todo. Y las voces de mi cabeza se vuelven cada vez más fuertes... En fin, me alegro de haberme dado cuenta a tiempo de que mi mente no se estaba volviendo loca por una mala mano, sino por otro motivo. Me inventé una excusa para levantar a la Lord Capitán de la mesa y alejarla de aquel lugar y, unos minutos después, la sala en la que habíamos estado...». {n}Idira no consigue reprimir las carcajadas.{/n} «¡Resultó que un listillo tuvo la misma brillante idea de traerse a su {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psíquico{/g} mascota! Uno de los que se esconden en los barrios bajos de Paso. Y el psíquico... ¡se debió de asustar, supongo! Después de todo el escándalo, la gente entró a la sala... ¡y se habían abalanzado unos sobre otros! ¡A la garganta! ¡Con sus dientes!». {n}Sin dejar de reír, Idira se seca una lágrima.{/n} «Ay... creo que desacoplaron ese asteroide al completo de Paso y lo lanzaron al espacio para que se fundiera contra la estrella local».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「それから、彼らは席に着き、カードが配られた。あたいは無関係を装って辺りをウロウロしていたけれど、そこで起きている事から目を離さなかったわ。そして、頭の中のあらゆるものがどんどん大きくなっていったの…とにかく、負け札のことで頭がおかしくなっているのではなくて、別のことが原因なのだと気づけたのはよかったわ。あたいは何か口実を作ってロード・キャプテンをテーブルから引き離し、その場から連れ去ったの。数分後、あたいたちがいた部屋は…」{n}イディラは思わず笑い出した。{/n}「ある賢い男が、子飼いの{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}を連れてくるという、同じくらい聡明な考えを持っていたことがわかったの！その中の1人は、フットフォールの地下をウロウロしているようなやつだったわ。そして、その異能者はただ…怖かったのでしょうね、きっと。騒ぎの後、みんなは部屋で何が起こったのかを見に行ったわ。彼らは皆、互いの喉に噛み付いていたの！言葉通りに！歯でね！」{n}イディラは涙を拭った。{/n}「はあ…それから彼らは、フットフォールからあの小惑星を完全に切り離し、現地の星に向かうように宇宙空間に押しやったんだと思うわ」
languages.original_text: "So, they sat down, and the cards were dealt. I'm hovering around, like I'm not involved, but I'm keeping my eye on things. And everything in my head keeps getting louder and louder... anyway, it's a good thing I realised in time that my mind wasn't going haywire over a losing hand, but something else. I made some excuse to drag the Lord Captain up from the table and took her away from that place, and a few minutes later, the room where we'd been..." {n}Idira can't help herself and bursts out laughing.{/n} "It turned out some wise guy had the same bright idea to bring a pet {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} along with him! One of those ones who just scuttle around in Footfall's underbelly. And the psyker just... freaked out, I guess! After all the commotion, people went to see what happened in the room — and they'd all gone for each others' throats! Literally! With teeth!" {n}Weeping, Idira wipes away a tear.{/n} "Huh... and I think they completely detached that asteroid from Footfall and pushed it off into open space so it would head off toward the local star."

traits.locale_text: 「それから、彼らは席に着き、カードが配られた。あたいは無関係を装って辺りをウロウロしていたけれど、そこで起きている事から目を離さなかったわ。そして、頭の中のあらゆるものがどんどん大きくなっていったの…とにかく、負け札のことで頭がおかしくなっているのではなくて、別のことが原因なのだと気づけたのはよかったわ。あたいは何か口実を作ってロード・キャプテンをテーブルから引き離し、その場から連れ去ったの。数分後、あたいたちがいた部屋は…」{n}イディラは思わず笑い出した。{/n}「ある賢い男が、子飼いの{g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}異能者{/g}を連れてくるという、同じくらい聡明な考えを持っていたことがわかったの！その中の1人は、フットフォールの地下をウロウロしているようなやつだったわ。そして、その異能者はただ…怖かったのでしょうね、きっと。騒ぎの後、みんなは部屋で何が起こったのかを見に行ったわ。彼らは皆、互いの喉に噛み付いていたの！言葉通りに！歯でね！」{n}イディラは涙を拭った。{/n}「はあ…それから彼らは、フットフォールからあの小惑星を完全に切り離し、現地の星に向かうように宇宙空間に押しやったんだと思うわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Also setzten sie sich und die Karten wurden ausgeteilt. Ich stehe herum, als sei ich nicht beteiligt, doch ich behalte alles im Auge. Und alles in meinem Kopf wird immer lauter und lauter ... Zum Glück wurde mir rechtzeitig klar, dass mein Verstand nicht wegen eines schlechten Blatts verrückt spielte, sondern wegen etwas anderem. Ich habe mir irgendeine Entschuldigung einfallen lassen, um den Lord Captain vom Tisch wegzuzerren, und brachte sie eilig fort. Und wenige Minuten später ist der Raum, in dem wir uns befunden hatten ..." {n}Ein unkontrolliertes Lachen platzt aus Idira hervor.{/n} "Irgendein Genie hatte die tolle Idee gehabt, einen {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} mitzunehmen! Eines von diesen Haustieren, die im Bauch von Footfall herumstreunen. Und der Psioniker ... ist wohl einfach ausgeflippt! Nachdem der Aufruhr abgeklungen war, haben die Leute nachgesehen, was in dem Raum geschehen war — und sie waren sich alle gegenseitig an die Gurgel gegangen! Buchstäblich! Mit den Zähnen!" {n}Idira wischt sich eine Träne aus den Augen.{/n} "Hm ... und ich glaube, sie haben diesen Asteroiden vollständig von Footfall abgekoppelt und in den freien Raum geschubst, damit er auf den örtlichen Stern zudriftet."
languages.original_text: "So, they sat down, and the cards were dealt. I'm hovering around, like I'm not involved, but I'm keeping my eye on things. And everything in my head keeps getting louder and louder... anyway, it's a good thing I realised in time that my mind wasn't going haywire over a losing hand, but something else. I made some excuse to drag the Lord Captain up from the table and took her away from that place, and a few minutes later, the room where we'd been..." {n}Idira can't help herself and bursts out laughing.{/n} "It turned out some wise guy had the same bright idea to bring a pet {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} along with him! One of those ones who just scuttle around in Footfall's underbelly. And the psyker just... freaked out, I guess! After all the commotion, people went to see what happened in the room — and they'd all gone for each others' throats! Literally! With teeth!" {n}Weeping, Idira wipes away a tear.{/n} "Huh... and I think they completely detached that asteroid from Footfall and pushed it off into open space so it would head off toward the local star."

Und alles in meinem Kopf wird immer lauter und lauter ... Zum Glück wurde mir rechtzeitig klar, dass mein Verstand nicht wegen eines schlechten Blatts verrückt spielte, sondern wegen etwas anderem. Ich habe mir irgendeine Entschuldigung einfallen lassen, um den Lord Captain vom Tisch wegzuzerren, und brachte sie eilig fort. Und wenige Minuten später ist der Raum, in dem wir uns befunden hatten ..." {n}Ein unkontrolliertes Lachen platzt aus Idira hervor.{/n} "Irgendein Genie hatte die tolle Idee gehabt, einen {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}Psioniker{/g} mitzunehmen! Eines von diesen Haustieren, die im Bauch von Footfall herumstreunen. Und der Psioniker ... ist wohl einfach ausgeflippt! Nachdem der Aufruhr abgeklungen war, haben die Leute nachgesehen, was in dem Raum geschehen war — und sie waren sich alle gegenseitig an die Gurgel gegangen! Buchstäblich! Mit den Zähnen!" {n}Idira wischt sich eine Träne aus den Augen.{/n} "Hm ... und ich glaube, sie haben diesen Asteroiden vollständig von Footfall abgekoppelt und in den freien Raum geschubst, damit er auf den örtlichen Stern zudriftet."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Donc ils s'assoient et le donneur distribue les cartes. Moi, je flâne dans le coin l'air de rien, mais je reste vigilante. Et dans ma tête, c'est de plus en plus fort... Heureusement, je me suis rendu compte à temps que ce n'était pas une mauvaise main qui causait ces perturbations dans mon esprit, mais autre chose. J'ai inventé une excuse pour sortir la seigneure-capitaine de là, et quelques minutes plus tard, la salle où on se trouvait... » {n}Idira ne peut pas s'empêcher d'éclater de rire.{/n} « En fait, un gros malin avait eu la brillante idée d'amener un {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} domestique ! Vous savez, un de ceux qui vagabondent dans les entrailles de Castel. Et donc, ce psyker... il a dû paniquer, j'imagine ! Quand le calme est revenu, certains sont allés voir ce qui s'était passé et... ils s'étaient tous sautés à la gorge ! Littéralement ! Avec les dents ! » {n}Idira essuie une larme.{/n} « Ha ha... Je crois même qu'ils ont fini par détacher cet astéroïde de Castel et qu'ils l'ont gentiment poussé vers l'étoile la plus proche. »
languages.original_text: "So, they sat down, and the cards were dealt. I'm hovering around, like I'm not involved, but I'm keeping my eye on things. And everything in my head keeps getting louder and louder... anyway, it's a good thing I realised in time that my mind wasn't going haywire over a losing hand, but something else. I made some excuse to drag the Lord Captain up from the table and took her away from that place, and a few minutes later, the room where we'd been..." {n}Idira can't help herself and bursts out laughing.{/n} "It turned out some wise guy had the same bright idea to bring a pet {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} along with him! One of those ones who just scuttle around in Footfall's underbelly. And the psyker just... freaked out, I guess! After all the commotion, people went to see what happened in the room — and they'd all gone for each others' throats! Literally! With teeth!" {n}Weeping, Idira wipes away a tear.{/n} "Huh... and I think they completely detached that asteroid from Footfall and pushed it off into open space so it would head off toward the local star."

traits.locale_text: « Donc ils s'assoient et le donneur distribue les cartes. Moi, je flâne dans le coin l'air de rien, mais je reste vigilante. Et dans ma tête, c'est de plus en plus fort... Heureusement, je me suis rendu compte à temps que ce n'était pas une mauvaise main qui causait ces perturbations dans mon esprit, mais autre chose. J'ai inventé une excuse pour sortir la seigneure-capitaine de là, et quelques minutes plus tard, la salle où on se trouvait... » {n}Idira ne peut pas s'empêcher d'éclater de rire.{/n} « En fait, un gros malin avait eu la brillante idée d'amener un {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} domestique ! Vous savez, un de ceux qui vagabondent dans les entrailles de Castel. Et donc, ce psyker... il a dû paniquer, j'imagine ! Quand le calme est revenu, certains sont allés voir ce qui s'était passé et... ils s'étaient tous sautés à la gorge ! Littéralement ! Avec les dents ! » {n}Idira essuie une larme.{/n} « Ha ha... Je crois même qu'ils ont fini par détacher cet astéroïde de Castel et qu'ils l'ont gentiment poussé vers l'étoile la plus proche. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Neyse, masaya oturdular ve kartlar dağıtıldı. Ben tepelerinde dikiliyorum. Hani ilgim yokmuş gibiyim ama gözüm de üzerlerinde. Beynimdeki sesler arttıkça artıyor... Neyse ki kafamdaki curcunanın, eli kaybedeceğimizden değil de bambaşka bir şeyden kaynaklandığını zamanında fark edebildim. Bir bahane uydurup Lord Kaptan'ı masadan çektim. Onu mekândan uzaklaştırmamın üstünden birkaç dakika geçmişti ki deminki odada..." {n}İdira, kahkaha koparmaktan kendini alamıyor.{/n} "Meğerse yanında evcil {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g} getirme fikri, bir sivri zekâlının daha aklına gelmiş! Binliman'ın varoşlarından birisini kapmış getirmiş. Galiba bizim ruhsezerin de ödü kopmuş! Gürültü patırtıyı duyanlar, odada neler olduğunu görmek için içeri akın ettiler. Sonra da birbirlerini boğazına daldılar! Harbi bak, hem de dişleriyle!" {n}İdira, gülmekten gözünden gelen yaşı siliyor.{/n} "Öyle işte. Galiba o asteroidi sistemlerindeki güneşe doğru ilerlesin diye Binliman'dan tamamen ayırıp uzay boşluğuna gönderdiler."
languages.original_text: "So, they sat down, and the cards were dealt. I'm hovering around, like I'm not involved, but I'm keeping my eye on things. And everything in my head keeps getting louder and louder... anyway, it's a good thing I realised in time that my mind wasn't going haywire over a losing hand, but something else. I made some excuse to drag the Lord Captain up from the table and took her away from that place, and a few minutes later, the room where we'd been..." {n}Idira can't help herself and bursts out laughing.{/n} "It turned out some wise guy had the same bright idea to bring a pet {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}psyker{/g} along with him! One of those ones who just scuttle around in Footfall's underbelly. And the psyker just... freaked out, I guess! After all the commotion, people went to see what happened in the room — and they'd all gone for each others' throats! Literally! With teeth!" {n}Weeping, Idira wipes away a tear.{/n} "Huh... and I think they completely detached that asteroid from Footfall and pushed it off into open space so it would head off toward the local star."

traits.locale_text: "Neyse, masaya oturdular ve kartlar dağıtıldı. Ben tepelerinde dikiliyorum. Hani ilgim yokmuş gibiyim ama gözüm de üzerlerinde. Beynimin içinde bir curcuna, sesler arttıkça artıyor... Her neyse, eli kaybettiğimizden değil de bambaşka bir şeyden dolayı kafayı sıyırdığımı vaktinde fark ettiğim iyi oldu. Bir bahane uydurup Lord Kaptan'ı masadan çektim. Onu mekândan uzaklaştırmamın üzerinden birkaç dakika geçmişti ki bulunduğumuz odada..." {n}İdira, kahkaha koparmaktan kendini alamıyor.{/n} "Meğerse akıllının teki, yanında evcil bir {g|Encyclopedia:Psyker}ruhsezer{/g} getirmek gibi şahane bir fikre kapılmış! Binliman'da dolaşıp duranlardan birisini kapmış getirmiş işte. Üstüne bir de ruhsezer... Korktu galiba! Tüm o gürültü patırtıyı duyanlar da odada neler olduğunu görmek için içeri akın ettiler. Sonra da birbirlerinin boğazına sarıldılar! Bildiğin sarıldılar! Dişler filan devreye girdi!" {n}İdira, gülmekten gözünden gelen yaşı siliyor.{/n} "Ah... Bir de sanırım o asteroidi sistemlerindeki güneşe doğru ilerlesin diye Binliman'dan tamamen ayırıp uzaya gönderdiler."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
